questions.answer: What can I help you with today?
questions.headline: Chief Complaint
questions.clinical_intent: To understand the primary reason for the patient's visit and gather initial information about their presenting problem.

questions.answer: I'm yellow. And this itching is driving. Me nuts. Feels like there are ants under my skin. What's going on? Am I dying?
questions.headline: Current Medications
questions.clinical_intent: To obtain an accurate and up-to-date list of all prescribed and over-the-counter medications the patient is currently taking.

questions.content: Do you have any known drug allergies?
questions.answer: I'm yellow. And this itching is driving. Me nuts. Feels like there are ants under my skin.
questions.headline: Drug Allergies
questions.clinical_intent: To identify potential adverse reactions to medications and ensure patient safety.

questions.content: Have you had any surgeries in the past?
questions.headline: Past Surgical History
questions.clinical_intent: To gather information on previous surgical interventions which may impact current health status or future treatment.

questions.content: Have you noticed any changes in the color of your urine (darker) or stool (lighter) recently?
questions.answer: Yeah, I got this dull ache under my ribs. Not sharp just heavy. And I'm really tired how to leave work early yesterday.
questions.headline: Gastrointestinal Symptom Assessment
questions.clinical_intent: To assess for common gastrointestinal symptoms that may indicate an underlying condition, particularly related to the hepatobiliary system.

questions.content: Have you had any recent travel, exposure to new people, or engaged in any activities that might put you at risk for viral hepatitis?
questions.headline: Hepatitis Exposure Risk
questions.clinical_intent: To assess potential exposure risks for viral hepatitis, including travel and social contacts.

questions.content: On a scale of 0 to 10, how severe is your jaw pain currently, and does it radiate anywhere else in your face or head?
questions.answer: Yeah, I got this dull ache under my ribs. Not sharp just heavy. And I'm really tired how to leave work early yesterday.
questions.headline: Jaw Pain Assessment
questions.clinical_intent: To quantify the severity of jaw pain and identify any associated radiating pain patterns.

questions.content: Have you had any recent travel, consumed raw seafood, or had any close contact with someone who has had similar symptoms?
questions.headline: Hepatitis Exposure Risk
questions.clinical_intent: To identify potential risk factors for hepatitis infection, such as travel, dietary exposure, or contact with infected individuals.

questions.content: Can you estimate how many Extra Strength Tylenol pills you take in a typical day, and how often you take Tylenol PM?
questions.headline: Tylenol Usage
questions.clinical_intent: To quantify the daily intake of Extra Strength Tylenol and the frequency of Tylenol PM use for medication adherence and safety assessment.
